meanings.definition: Surgery on the nervous system, especially the brain and spinal cord.
meanings.sent1: Neurosurgery can help fix problems in the brain and spinal cord.
meanings.sent2: The neurosurgery went smoothly, and the patient recovered well.
meanings.sent3: After the neurosurgery, the brain felt like it had a tune-up.
meanings.sent4: Her precision in neurosurgery was like a skilled artist painting delicate strokes.
meanings.sent5: The neurosurgery room buzzed with focused energy as the team prepared for the operation.

meanings.definition: The medical specialty concerned with the prevention, diagnosis, treatment, and rehabilitation of disorders that affect any portion of the nervous system.
meanings.sent1: Neurosurgery involves treating various nervous system disorders.
meanings.sent2: She decided to specialize in neurosurgery to help patients with nerve issues.
meanings.sent3: The neurosurgery department always had the latest gadgets to diagnose patients.
meanings.sent4: In her hands, neurosurgery became a symphony of healing for the nervous system.
meanings.sent5: The impact of neurosurgery on patients' lives was profound and life-changing.
